meanings.definition: The quality of being cheerful and full of energy.
meanings.sent1: Her ebulliency was contagious, spreading joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: His ebulliency was evident as he danced around the room with a big smile on his face.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's ebulliency was on full display as it wagged its tail excitedly.
meanings.sent4: The ebulliency of the children playing in the park was like a burst of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The ebulliency of the crowd at the concert made the atmosphere electric and lively.
